title: Spenser for Hire - The Hopes and Fears (Christmas Episode)
description:
The Hopes and Fears (1986)

Second season Christmas episode. 

With the help of Hawk, a disgusted Spenser is determined to get rid of thugs who are terrorizing his Boston neighborhood during the Christmas holiday.

Ripped from a VHS recording I made in 1994.

Starring:
Robert Urich ...  Spenser 
Avery Brooks ...  Hawk 
Carolyn McCormick ...  Assistant District Attorney Rita Fiore 
Ron McLarty ...  Sgt. Frank Belson 
Richard Jaeckel ...  Lt. Martin Quirk 
Nancy Travis ... Maggie Ellis
Seth Green ...  Andy Chandler 


Output codec: XviD
Audio: English AC3 2ch
Subtitles: none
Format: AVI
Aspect Ratio: 1.33 Fullscreen
Runtime: 46 min.
Color

QuincyMKT
